description: Size description:Size US XS (Asian M): chest 96 cm, total length 67cm, shoulder 41cm, sleeve length 60 cmSize US S (Asian L): chest 100cm, total length 69cm, shoulder 43cm, sleeve length 62cmSize US M (Asian XL): chest 104cm, total length 70cm, shoulder 45cm, sleeve length 63cmSize US L (Asian 2XL): chest 108cm, total length 72cm, shoulder 46.5cm, sleeve length 64cmSize US XL (Asian 3XL): chest 112cm, total length 74cm, shoulder 48cm, sleeve length 66cmNote:-1- Asian Size is smaller than US size, please consult the table of measures carefully before purchasing the item.-2- Please Allow 1 to 3 cm by measuring the gap due to manual measurement !-3- Because of the difference between different monitors, the image can not reflect the actual color of the item.-4- If you do not know how to decide, welcome to contact our customer service, we will help you choose.Package Included:1* Dress Shirt
